raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard slisBNB to Aave V3 BNB chain
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---

### [TEMP CHECK] Onboard slisBNB to Aave V3 BNB chain 
### Author: Lorena (ListaDAO)
###  Date: 2024-06-27

---

### **Simple Summary:**
This Temp Check proposes the addition of slisBNB from ListaDAO to Aave V3 BNB chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

**Motivation**
1. Benefits of listing: 
slisBNB is the native yield bearing and liquid staking token for BNB, built by Lista DAO. slisBNB appreciates against BNB in line with BNB’s staking APR, allowing users have the freedom to earn additional yields on different DeFi platforms while earning staking rewards passively.

slisBNB is the largest BNB LST in terms of TVL (~$225M) and holders (350,262), listing slisBNB can bring both Aave and Lista communities the opportunities to enjoy the passive yield of supplying slisBNB on Aave as well as the Lista token airdrop. 

2. Chain to be deployed: BNB Chain
3. Proof of Liquidity: Lista DAO is open to provide $2500 weekly incentives, last for 8 weeks to bootstrap the liquidity of slisBNB on Aave. 
4. Useful links: https://lista.org/


**Disclaimer**
This proposal is powered by core contributor of ListaDAO.

The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Lista DAO and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

**Next Steps**
1.If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2.If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3.Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4.If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

**Copyright**

Copyright and related rights waived via CC0.

cleaned.title: [TEMP CHECK]  Deploy a Crypto.com Aave v3 Instance
cleaned.author: 0xEd039871ec71FBDC3D714517cE97030Dd2E88622

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK]  Deploy a Crypto.com Aave v3 Instance
raw.author: 0xEd039871ec71FBDC3D714517cE97030Dd2E88622
raw.body:
## Author:  ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)

## Date: 2024-09-10

---

## **Summary**

This proposal is for the creation of a specific Aave v3 instance in partnership with [Crypto.com](http://Crypto.com) which will be used for their Earn product using WETH and cdcETH.

## **Motivation**

[Crypto.com](http://Crypto.com) is one of the world’s largest exchanges, currently listed as number 6 on DeFi Llama in terms of total assets. In addition to a large number of global users and partnerships, they have a staked ETH product called cdcETH with over $80m TVL. 

The original [TEMP CHECK proposal](https://governance.aave.com/t/temp-check-onboard-cdceth-to-aave-v3-on-ethereum/18259) to onboard cdcETH to the main Aave v3 instance, ended in an abstain result, indicating a desire of the DAO to further explore opportunities at a later time. 

After discussions with the CDC team, ACI believes there are good synergies in creating a specific instance of Aave v3 that will allow them to integrate their Earn product and create a dedicated location for looping of cdcETH via emode to kickstart the instance liquidity, before including stablecoins to offer more yield options to CDC earn users.

## Specification

The [Crypto.Com](http://Crypto.Com) Aave v3 instance will target the following:

- We target $35M TVL for the CDC instance at start, with $20M+ on the WETH.
- Drive liquidity to the new instance with a combination of their CeDeFi Earn product, Wallet integration, 3rd party specialized platforms and CDC-owned liquidity.
- The [Crypto.com](http://Crypto.com) team has committed to $1 million worth of incentives for the first 6 months of launch to bootstrap initial liquidity. The ACI is in favor of matching this incentive amount via the Ahab program to increase the adoption velocity of this potential instance.

Contract address: 0xfe18aE03741a5b84e39C295Ac9C856eD7991C38e

Risk Parameters will be provided at ARFC stage by Risk Service Providers.

## Useful Links

Audit: https://crypto.com/document/blocksec_securityaudit2024

Issuer: [Crypto.com](http://crypto.com/)

DeFi Llama: [https://defillama.com/protocol/crypto.com-staked-eth 2](https://defillama.com/protocol/crypto.com-staked-eth)

Coingecko: [https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/crypto-com-staked-eth 1](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/crypto-com-staked-eth)

[Crypto.com](http://crypto.com/) Staking page: [Crypto Staking — Crypto.com | Earn up to 16.64% per year by staking with us](https://crypto.com/staking)

[Crypto.com](http://crypto.com/) Liquid Staking Q&A page: [Liquid Staking | Crypto.com Help Center](https://help.crypto.com/en/articles/8398277-liquid-staking)

## Disclaimer

The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Crypto.com and did not receive compensation for creating this proposal.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to the ARFC stage.
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating the proposal to the ARFC snapshot stage.
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

## Copyright:

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

cleaned.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard EIGEN to Aave V3 Ethereum
cleaned.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard EIGEN to Aave V3 Ethereum
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
## **Author: ACI**

## **Date: 2024-10-04**

---

### **Simple Summary:**

The current TEMP CHECK aims to onboard EIGEN, the native token of Eigenlayer, in Aave V3 Ethereum Market. This onboarding will allow Aave users to supply and borrow EIGEN, thereby enhancing the utility and liquidity of the Eigenlayer token within the DeFi ecosystem and more specifically, within the Aave ecosystem.

### **Motivation/Background:**

Eigenlayer is a protocol focused on shared security and restaking, enabling Ethereum stakers to extend their security guarantees to multiple services and protocols. EIGEN is the governance and utility token for Eigenlayer, playing a critical role in the network’s operations, staking mechanisms, and protocol governance. By onboarding EIGEN to Aave V3, we aim to create new opportunities for Aave users to engage with this emerging staking ecosystem, while expanding EIGEN's liquidity.

**Benefits of listing that token:** 

Provide opportunities for Aave users to borrow against their EIGEN to unlock liquidity, or alternatively to borrow EIGEN against other collateral allowing them to stake it in the Eigenlayer ecosystem to earn rewards.

**Market Impact:** 

We see no significant market impact from onboarding EIGEN except for providing new opportunities to Aave users which may cause users to switch from borrowing other tokens against their collateral. Overall we see onboarding EIGEN as net good for Aave users as it expands opportunities for them to engage in a new, important ecosystem.

**Chain to be deployed/listed:** 

Ethereum Mainnet

**Proof of Liquidity (POL) and Deposit Commitments:** 

POL and Deposit Commitments will be discussed at the ARFC stage.

### **Useful Links:**

- [Eigenlayer website](https://eigenfoundation.org/)
- [Eigenlayer documentation](https://docs.eigenfoundation.org/category/faq-eigen-token-overview)

### **Disclaimer:**

This proposal is powered by Skywards. The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Eigenlayer Foundation and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

ACI and ACI employees may be holders of EIGEN.

### **Next Steps:**

1. If consensus is reached on this TEMP CHECK, escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, escalate to ARFC stage.
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage.
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

### **Copyright:**

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

raw.body:
---

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard BNBx on Aave V3 BNB Chain  
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-03-04

---

## **Summary**

This TEMP CHECK proposes the addition of BNBx from Stader to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

BNBx is a liquid staked token of BNB from Stader. Users can freely mint BNBx in exchange for BNB deposits and earn yield from staking.

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract address: [0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275](https://bscscan.com/token/0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275)

Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

**Useful Links**

- Website: https://www.staderlabs.com/
- BNBx docs: https://binance.docs.staderlabs.com/

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

## Copyright

raw.body:
---

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard wbETH on Aave V3 BNB Chain 
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-03-05

---

## **Summary**

This TEMP CHECK proposes the addition of wbETH the Binance Liquid Staked ETH Token to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

Liquid Staked Tokens are one of the premier collateral types on Aave and drive most of the ETH borrow demand. wBETH is one of the largest Liquid Staking Tokens on the market and one of the more productive assets available on BNB Chain.  

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract: [0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1](https://bscscan.com/token/0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1)

Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

**Useful links:** 
- Website: https://www.binance.com/en/ethereum-staking

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

decision.summary: The proposal to onboard lisUSD to Aave V3 BNB instance is strongly supported by voting timeline metrics, similar successful past onboardings, and cautious but generally positive forum sentiment.
key_arguments_for: Timeline metrics show unanimous early and stable voting support for YAE option.
Similar past proposals to onboard assets to Aave V3 BNB showed positive TVL growth and price impact, indicating beneficial protocol enhancements.
Forum sentiment, while cautious, supports the initiative with calls for risk mitigation and audit clarity in later stages.
Onboarding lisUSD can enhance liquidity and yield opportunities on Aave, benefiting users and protocol fees.
key_arguments_against: Concerns about lisUSD collateral concentration in BNB and liquid staking derivatives pose peg stability risks.
Lack of clear audit documentation and long-term incentive structure for LISTA tokens.
Forum suggests phased integration with conservative borrowing caps and liquidity safeguards to mitigate risks.

evidence.quote: Forum comments show mixed sentiment with key concerns on collateral risk and audit clarity but overall cautious support.
Timeline metrics indicate a strong, stable, and early lead for the YAE option with perfect stability and early vote ratio.

evidence.reference: [TEMP CHECK] Deploy Aave v3 on Plasma and others
evidence.quote: Similar proposals successfully onboarded assets with positive TVL impact and price appreciation, supporting the change stance.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'YAE' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
• The voting timeline metrics show a unanimous and stable lead for the 'YAE' option, indicating strong early and continuous support.
• Historical similar proposals to onboard assets to Aave V3 BNB instance resulted in positive TVL growth and price impacts, suggesting successful integration and beneficial outcomes.
• Forum sentiment is cautiously supportive, highlighting concerns about collateral concentration risks and audit clarity, which should be addressed in subsequent ARFC stages.
• The recommendation to onboard lisUSD aligns with forum sentiment overall and aims to enhance liquidity and yield opportunities on Aave, supporting the protocol's long-term health.
